title: Resolve a Supplier Delivery Delay
description: A buyer is notified by a supplier that a critical shipment will be delayed. They need to assess the impact.

tasks.description: Identify all upcoming production orders that depend on the delayed material.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of work orders that will be affected by the delay.

tasks.description: Contact the supplier to get a firm revised delivery date and explore options for expediting.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates with the supplier and gets a new ETA.

tasks.description: Update the expected delivery date on the purchase order and notify the production planning team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the PO and sends a notification to the planning department.
